description: Capacity Development for Effective Service Delivery in the Developing Regional States

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: The UNDP supported programme entitled “Capacity Development for Effective Service Delivery in the Developing Regional States (DRS)” constitutes the Local Governance component of the Joint UN programme for DRS, which is a response to the government’s request to design a programme that will help to address multifaceted problems of the four DRS to catch up with the neighbouring regions.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Capacity Building for Service

title: Capacity Development for Service Delivery in the DRS
